inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Mace', 'CriticalMultiplier', 1); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Morningstar', 'CriticalMultiplier', 1); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Flail', 'CriticalMultiplier', 1); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Master Training, Maces
description: You do an additional 1x damage on critical hits with maces, morningstars, and flails.
